name: DNS Only Configuration
description: Configuration that loads only SampleAgentA for DNS lookups

instructions: When performing DNS lookups, you're verifying that a domain name resolves to IP addresses
An NXDOMAIN error means the domain doesn't exist in DNS
A timeout error means the DNS server didn't respond in time
Multiple IP addresses may be returned for load balancing or redundancy
additional_prompt_info.error_handling: If DNS lookups fail, the domain may not exist or there could be network connectivity issues
